It's typically a group with one male and lots of females.  And the lead male and female are the ones who take care of all the babies. How many eggs do ostriches lay at once?

So each individual female typically lays an average of like 10 to 12 eggs.  But again, among the whole group, the whole flock of ostriches, they can lay up to 100 eggs together.  And so the lead male and female will have to take care of up to 100 babies sometimes.
And how old do they get?

So once you get one of them, you're stuck with it.
